name: Smelly Cat
overview: Rayo is a stray cat, flea and smelly, who lives very happily on the street, one day he is captured by some scientists and they submit him to intelligence tests, in which you must help Rayo to pass the screen collecting all the fish bones, until you can escape from the room complex. The only weapon our character has to defend himself is his ability to jump and move agilely and the power to launch a cloud of stinking plague at will, but this only affects enemies with a good sense of smell, the rest will have to be avoided as much as possible and follow a strategy to solve the problems of each screen.
